value.string:
"""
 This scripts add the balance of every gap account in the list 'accounts'
 it use portal_simulation.getInventory. 
 The following REQUEST keys are mandatory : 
 at_date
 
 those are optional : 
 gap_base
 simulation_state
 resource
 section_category
 
 those are ignored from the request and should explicitely passed as keywords args to this script : 
 from_date
 
 parameters keywords to this script overrides REQUEST keys
 
 """
 def shortAccountNumberToFullGapCategory(accountNumber):
 '''translacja numeru konta na peln\xc4\x85 \xc5\x9bcie\xc5\xbck\xc4\x99 do konta
 w drzewie gap'''
 # slownik numerow 'unusual' (takich ktorych parent jest nietypowy)
 unu={'222-03':True, '222-07':True, '222-22':True, '223-01':True, '223-02':True, '223-03':True, '223-04':True, '223-05':True, '223-06':True, '227-01':True, '227-11':True, '227-12':True, '227-13':True, '227-14':True, '227-23':True, '249-91':True, '249-92':True, '29-20':True, '29-24':True, '75-0-01':True, '75-0-02':True, '75-0-03':True, '75-0-04':True, '75-1-01':True, '75-1-02':True, '75-1-03':True, '75-1-04':True, '75-1-05':True, '75-1-06':True, '75-1-07':True, '76-0-01':True, '76-0-02':True, '76-0-03':True, '76-0-04':True, '76-0-05':True, '76-0-06':True, '76-1-01':True, '76-1-02':True, '76-1-03':True, '76-1-04':True, '76-1-05':True, '76-1-06':True, '76-1-07':True, '76-1-08':True, '76-1-09':True, '76-1-10':True, '77-0-01':True, '77-0-02':True, '77-0-03':True, '77-1-01':True, '77-1-02':True, '77-1-03':True, '79-0-01':True, '79-0-02':True, '79-0-03':True, '79-1-01':True, '79-1-02':True, '79-1-03':True}
 accountNumber=accountNumber.strip()
 unusual=unu.has_key(accountNumber)
 gapt=accountNumber.split('-')
 path=[]
 path.append(request.get('gap_base','gap/pl/wpk'))
 for i in range(len(accountNumber)):
 if accountNumber[i]!='-':
 if not (unusual and i==len(accountNumber)-2):
 path.append(accountNumber[:i+1])
 return '/'.join(path)
 
 request = context.REQUEST
 kw = {}
 kw['omit_simulation'] = 1
 kw["simulation_state"] = request.get("simulation_state", ['stopped', 'delivered'])
 kw["resource"] = request.get("resource", "price_currency/PLN")
 kw["section_uid"] = context.restrictedTraverse(request.get("organisation")).getUid()
 kw["at_date"] = request['at_date']
 kw.update(params_kw)
 
 sum = 0
 for account in accounts :
 kw["node_category"] = shortAccountNumberToFullGapCategory(account)
 # checks the node category exists
 if context.restrictedTraverse('portal_categories/%s' % kw["node_category"], None) is not None :
 context.log('KW',kw)
 val = (context.portal_simulation.getInventory(**kw) or 0)
 sum += val
 return float ("%.2f"%(sum))
 # vim: syntax=python
